tier_1.label: Blue Chips (BTC, ETH, BNB, SOL, XRP, ADA, AVAX, DOT, LINK, POL)
tier_1.note: Guidelines for Sonnet — highest conviction, most patient

tier_2.label: Established (ATOM, NEAR, OP, ARB, SUI, AAVE, UNI, etc.)
tier_2.note: Guidelines for Sonnet — standard risk management

tier_3.label: DISABLED — Tier 3 coins deactivated (too volatile for training)
tier_3.note: Tier 3 deactivated in DB. Only T1 and T2 are traded.

thresholds.note: These are ALERTS to Haiku, not trading triggers. The AI decides what matters.

confidence_thresholds.note: Safety net — Sonnet can still make intelligent decisions below these, but actions are downgraded

escalation.note: Haiku decides whether to escalate based on signal quality, not rigid cutoffs. sonnet_dedup_minutes prevents re-escalating same symbol too frequently.

circuit_breaker.note: Safety net — pauses trading after 3 consecutive losses OR total drawdown exceeds max_drawdown_percent

sms.note: SMS via Twilio for critical trade alerts only

exit_scanner.note: Evaluates open positions every Nth cycle. Urgency >= threshold escalates to Sonnet. Critical bypasses cooldown.

learning.note: Nightly Sonnet analysis of closed trades to update prompts
